title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
In Moodle, an SQL injection risk was identified in the library fetching a user's recent courses.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36393
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424798
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f46j-r7q3-6cm2
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle SQL Injection vulnerability

items.content_html:
In Moodle, the file repository's URL parsing required additional recursion handling to mitigate the risk of recursion denial of service.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36395
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424801
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-273w-7fxj-pcp6
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption

items.content_html:
In Moodle, insufficient redirect handling made it possible to blindly bypass cURL blocked hosts/allowed ports restrictions, resulting in a blind SSRF risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36396
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424802
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4rmj-w58m-fvch
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery

items.content_html:
Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Stored in GitHub repository uvdesk/community-skeleton prior to 1.1.0.

items.title: [uvdesk/community-skeleton] uvdesk/community-skeleton vulnerable to Stored Cross-site Scripting

items.content_html:
Improper Authorization in GitHub repository wallabag/wallabag prior to 2.5.4.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-0734
  • https://github.com/wallabag/wallabag/commit/acd285dcbb71b595e6320bb1d0d3a44cdf646ac0

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8ccw-f83g-v7g3
items.title: [wallabag/wallabag] Wallabag Improper Authorization vulnerability

items.content_html:
Math/PrimeField.php in phpseclib has an infinite loop with composite primefields. This vulnerability was introduced in version 3.0.0, and has been patched in 3.0.19. The CVE for this issue originally identified the the vulnerable version as 2.x, however, the vulnerable functionality was not introduced until version 3.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-27560
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/commit/6298d1cd55c3ffa44533bd41906caec246b60440
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/commit/6298d1cd55c3ffa44533bd41906caec246b60440#commitcomment-103226722
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/releases/tag/3.0.19
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hm7p-r324-hhf3
items.title: [phpseclib/phpseclib] phpseclib Infinite Loop vulnerability

items.content_html:
Use of Platform-Dependent Third Party Components in GitHub repository cockpit-hq/cockpit 2.3.9 and prior. A patch is available and anticipated to be part of version 2.4.0.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-1160
  • https://github.com/cockpit-hq/cockpit/commit/690016208850f2d788ebc3c67884d4c692587eb8
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/3ce480dc-1b1c-4230-9287-0dc3b31c2f87
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p8cq-pv6w-6rwx
items.title: [cockpit-hq/cockpit] Cockpit Uses Platform-Dependent Third Party Components

items.content_html:
A vulnerability was found in Codiad 2.8.0. It has been rated as problematic. Affected by this issue is the function saveJSON of the file components/install/process.php. The manipulation of the argument data leads to information disclosure. The attack may be launched remotely. Upgrading to version 2.8.1 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is 517119de673e62547ee472a730be0604f44342b5. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. VDB-221498 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-20178
  • https://github.com/Codiad/Codiad/pull/974
  • https://github.com/Codiad/Codiad/commit/517119de673e62547ee472a730be0604f44342b5
  • https://github.com/Codiad/Codiad/releases/tag/v.2.8.1
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.221498
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.221498
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2q79-56rq-8v3c
items.title: [codiad/codiad] Codiad information disclosure vulnerability
